brandComInfo.introduce:
上海尼奇广告成立于2013年，致力于数字化广告全案营销，服务欧莱雅、好时、康师傅、可口可乐等众多知名客户。期待喜爱新事务、乐观、积极的你加入！
NIQI欢迎你！
5 new openings at NIQI Shanghai:
1 art director, 2 designers, 1 copywriter, 1 project manager.
We are looking for people who match our culture and beliefs.
We believe that brands can improve people lives.
Everything we do is finalized to support brands become an emotional yet concrete valuable part of our lives through great creativity and innovative technology.
If you are a rockstar / prima donna advertising person, who works only to celebrate a super ego, we don't need you and, frankly, you don't need us.
If you seek big agency names only to build an impressive resume, we are not what you are looking for and, frankly, we are not looking for you either.
If you cannot get excited for what you do, stay away please, you will see us only as a bunch of crazy visionaries.
But if you love people and brands, if you understand them, if you are excited and motivated by the challenge to find new creative ways to connect the two, by bringing value to the people and profit to the brand, then we desperately need you.

*****
